title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 257-1.3 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 257-1.3 - Application

State Regulations
(a) The standards
shall be applicable statewide. (b) The procedures and techniques employed to determine ambient air concentrations
of contaminants shall be as specified in the standard. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
257-1.3

Amended

New

York State Register November 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 48, eff. 12/7/2019

Amended

New

York State Register January 17, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 3, eff. 1/26/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
